review: Ambiente è accogliente e sicuramenre la cucina è il punto forte dell'Omasilia!  pur essendo vegetariana, è varia, curata,leggera ma saporita,la colazione è abbondante,con ottimi omelette e pancakes! bisogna ammettere che il cuoco, proveniente dal Bihari, una delle  zone più povere, ci sa fare con i suoi frittini di verdura,i piccoli antipastini non così consueti in questa aerea di India e le zuppette!!Ninchet, il responsabile, è una giovane attento e disponibile verso i suoi ospiti,parla un eccellente inglese,ed ha voglia di crescere, con un occhio alla tradizione e uno alla valorizzazione di questa splendida terra, (con il fratello gestisce in parallelo anche una agenzia di trekking)!abbiamo approfittato della sua esperienza come guida  in un cammino di tre gg x raggiungere il
name: francamontagnoli

review: Etwas außerhalb gelegenes, sehr einfach ausgestattetes Gasthaus. Wir waren im Nebengebäude untergebracht. Strom gab es nur stundenweise, auch das Wasser war meistens kalt. Der Weg zum Zimmer glich eher einer Baustelle, es roch sehr stark nach frischer Farbe und Verdünner. Das Essen war ok, allerdings sehr wenig gewürzt - besonders für indische Verhältnisse. Gute Matratzen, daher Schlafqualität in Ordnung.
name: Bin unterwegs

review: Ho^tel confortable et neuf avec 25 chambres avec vues magnifiques sur les montagnes et le fleuve Zanskar .Situé dans les faubourgs de Padum ,l 'hotel offre une nourriture excellente ^dans un restaurant très agréable . Prix des chambres 20 à 30 euros avec petit déjeuner . Manager très dynamique et sympathique ,personnel souriant et serviable .  L 'ho^tel est ouvert du 1er Juin à la fin Novembre selon l 'état des routes en provenance de kargil . Petit jardin agréable et fleuri :parking pour les voitures .
name: Marc66

review: I had a accident 5 days before in Srinagar where I was hid by a motorbike the lower right leg swelled and with pain I showed this to the hotelmamager and he helped me to the local hospital, helped by doctor, x-ray, medicin, everything he payed for me, didn´t want any money/rupee to be payed back from me A manager with a very big heart, always helpfull.  The hotel is beautifully situated close to the mountains and to the river. I can only recommend this hotel!
name: jan h

review: The hotel is very basic and the rooms are average and we had a real bad stench to the room coming from the septic tank which was behind the building block ...house keeping was not much to talk about and the toilets were again very average with hot water just about there for a shower.  Frankly you really do not have much of a choice as we were told it was the best ..though the staff was wonderful and the food was average.
name: Ovi
